content: mesh market bag beginner crochet pattern by miss witchcrafts this beginner friendly market bag pattern will teach you to make a smaller sized yet versatile reusable diamond mesh market bag with some stretch and an integrated stuff sack the pattern also features suggested modifications to make the base bag fruit themed for those spring and summer farmers markets trader joes snack runs and so much more * single skein project if worked as base bag without modifications instagram @misswitchcrafts + ribblr https //ribblr com/shop/miss-witchcrafts + ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/misswitchcrafts miss witchcrafts i m kiki a craft enthusiast and pet parent based in northern california i learned the basics of crochet nearly 30 years ago and in recent years have been designing crochet patterns i believe in accessibility and clear instruction within written crochet patterns so each of my designs is written to be enjoyed by crafters of all skill levels firmly within my granny era i adore cottagecore themes fresh florals and the versatility of simple stitches thank you for your interest in my design - i hope it serves you well and please don t hesitate to reach out with any questions or pattern assistance needs i would love to see your work please feel free to tag me on instagram - @misswitchcrafts m a t e r i a l s n e e d e d single skein cotton yarn at least 150 yds / 85 g 6mm hook yarn needle to weave in ends stitch markers -
